fields.name: SCRCaseQueue
fields.fieldText: A ticket/case has been sent to the tech team's queue for review. Please allow 2 business days for a response.

fields.name: Account_Recognition_Name
fields.helpText: How the organization's name should appear on mail addresses and publications

fields.name: Consultant_vs_Internal_Rationale
fields.helpText: Please indicate why this work would be best performed by Consultant vs. Internal Staff.

fields.name: Pay_Rate
fields.helpText: Project-based fees are preferred. Time-based fees are permitted when contract is federally-funded ONLY with a determination that no other contract type is suitable.

fields.name: Maximum_Allowable_Compensation
fields.helpText: Maximum allowable compensation for this contract. A value ($0 or greater) is required for consulting procurements

fields.name: Currency_Hint
fields.fieldText: Please only type numbers into Currency fields, the $ will auto-populate!

fields.name: Travel_Reimbursement
fields.helpText: Will consultant be reimbursed for travel expenses on top of fee?

fields.name: Key_Project_Contact_s
fields.helpText: If consultant is a business (not an individual), will all the work be performed by specified people? If yes, identify them.

fields.name: NL_employee_contractor_reports_t
fields.helpText: New Leaders person overseeing vendor or Independent Contractor's work and approving invoices.

fields.name: Access_to_Confidential_Information1
fields.helpText:
Will consultant have access or potential access to any confidential information of

New Leaders or a third party? Note: You must check YES if consultant will have access to Salesforce.

fields.name: Purpose_of_Access_to_Confidential_Information1
fields.fieldText: Purpose of Access to Confidential Information

screens.name: SCRExternal_Contact_Review
screens.label: External Contact Review

fields.name: HelpUpdateContact
fields.fieldText: Please ensure the main business contact's email is up to date by confirming/updating the Work Email field and setting the Preferred Email field to "Work Email."

fields.name: PleaseGoBack
fields.fieldText: Please go back and fill in all required fields. Cost Range and Multiple Sources Considered.

fields.name: Comparative_Vendor_1_Name
fields.helpText: 3 Bids are required for all purchases greater than $3,500. Please include 2 vendors with comparative prices that were not selected.

fields.name: Comparative_Vendor_1_Price
fields.helpText: 3 Bids are required for all purchases greater than $3,500. Please include 2 vendors with comparative prices that were not selected.

fields.name: Comparative_Vendor_1_Source_of_Price
fields.helpText: 3 Bids are required for all purchases greater than $3,500. Please include 2 vendors with comparative prices that were not selected.

fields.name: Comparative_Vendor_2_Name
fields.helpText: 3 Bids are required for all purchases greater than $3,500. Please include 2 vendors with comparative prices that were not selected.

fields.name: Comparative_Vendor_2_Price
fields.helpText: 3 Bids are required for all purchases greater than $3,500. Please include 2 vendors with comparative prices that were not selected.

fields.name: Comparative_Vendor_2_Source_of_Price
fields.helpText: 3 Bids are required for all purchases greater than $3,500. Please include 2 vendors with comparative prices that were not selected.

fields.name: compvendor
fields.fieldText: Please remember to attach the comparative vendor files before submitting.

fields.name: What_type_of_procurement_is_this
fields.fieldText: What type of procurement is this?

fields.name: DISPTXTTechOnly
fields.fieldText: Please note: The tech team creates procurements for technology. Feel free to move to the next screen and your request will be diverted to the technology team for review. A procurement will not be created.

fields.name: Paid_by_Specific_Funding_Source2
fields.helpText: Will work be paid for by a specific funding source? If yes, what funding source is paying for this work? Please note official name/identifier of funding, so that any restrictions from the funding source can be verified.

fields.name: Cost_Range_cstm
fields.helpText: Select the applicable range for the total cost of this purchase. As outlined in the Procurement Policy & Procedures, purchases with a total cost under $3,500 AND no signature requirement DO NOT require documentation in Salesforce.

fields.name: Fiscal_Year_s
fields.fieldText: Fiscal Year(s) (Use Ctrl-Click to select multiple)

fields.name: Start_Date
fields.helpText: Date work or services start.

fields.name: End_Date
fields.helpText: Date work or services end. If unknown, set to last day of last Fiscal Year (e.g."6/30/2018").

fields.name: Open_Ended_No_End_Date
fields.helpText: Agreement is recurring or open-ended.

validationRule.errorMessage: Please be sure the start and end dates are sequential and if open ended - leave the end date blank and check "Open Ended - No End Date"

fields.name: Multiple_Sources_ConsCustm
fields.helpText: Please refer to the Procurement Policy & Procedures to determine when consideration of multiple sources is required; if required but did not take place, CFO approval must be obtained. Complete Comparative Vendor Section.

fields.name: Small_Business_Type2
fields.helpText: Most state/municipal govt small business admin/economic development websites have directories of registered minority/women’s businesses. (Example, http://www.sba8a.com, https://ny.newnycontracts.com/FrontEnd/ VendorSearchPublic.asp?XID=5173&TN=ny)

fields.name: Special_Terms
fields.helpText: Please note any concerns or issues specific to this contract that may impact the agreement terms (ex. a requirement to license special materials, a requirement to have a special registration).

fields.name: Cost
fields.helpText: Please include the cost of the goods or services based on the bid/price from the requested vendor/contractor

fields.name: Description_of_Procurement_Need
fields.helpText:
Provide a brief description to help the approvers understand the purpose of the contract request.
Note: Please Chatter @deborahjordan to update this section as program details change during the contract review and approval process.

validationRule.errorMessage: Please shorten your description, limited to 32,000 characters.

fields.name: Fiscal_Year_s_Use_Ctrl_Click_to_select_multiple
fields.fieldText: Fiscal Year(s) (Use Ctrl-Click to select multiple)

fields.name: Function_Team2custom
fields.helpText: Team responsible for this contract.

fields.name: Start_Date2
fields.helpText: Date work or services start.

fields.name: EndDate2
fields.helpText: Date work or services end. If unknown, set to last day of last Fiscal Year (e.g."6/30/2018").

fields.name: Open_Ended2
fields.helpText: Agreement is recurring or open-ended.

validationRule.errorMessage: Please be sure the start and end dates are sequential and if open ended - leave the end date blank and check "Open Ended - No End Date"

fields.name: Description_of_contract
fields.helpText: Please enter a short description of that this contract is for

fields.name: SCRFunding_Source_Type
fields.helpText: If you selected "Yes" for "Paid for by a Specific Funding Source" above, note the type of funding.

fields.name: Procurement_Instrument
fields.helpText: All consultant requests and most other procurements require a procurement contract. Please contact Finance to discuss whether a purchase order may be appropriate in other situations.

fields.name: extlead
fields.fieldText: Client/partner/vendor's contact person. If left blank on an Opportunity Contract, will default to the Primary Contact on the Related Opportunity.

fields.name: InternalLead
fields.fieldText: List the client engagement lead. (if left blank will default to contract owner)

fields.name: Department_To_Be_ChargedCstm
fields.helpText: If the invoice will need to be allocated to multiple departments, enter the home department.

fields.name: Functional_TeamCustom
fields.helpText: Team responsible for this contract.

fields.name: DispWrongStaffContact
fields.fieldText: The contact you selected for internal staff does not work at New Leaders, please go back and try again.

fields.name: FileMem
fields.fieldText: Please remember to attach the sole source correspondence to the procurement before submitting.

fields.name: Single_Source_Criteria
fields.fieldText: Single Source Criteria (Check all that apply)
fields.helpText: Explain the rationale for not considering multiple sources for this contract.

fields.name: Date_RequestedScr
fields.helpText: Deadline for sending contract to client. For time-sensitive contract requests, please allow at least five business days from the day the contract drafter receives notice of the contract draft request in Salesforce. Chatter Debbie if urgent!!!

validationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a date after today! If you need this request in less than 5 days please enter urgency in Timing Needs

fields.name: Description_and_Timing_Needs
fields.fieldText: Timing Needs - Additional Input & Approval Needs
fields.helpText: Indication of People outside the official approval process

fields.name: UrgencyText
fields.fieldText: Please enter information about urgency if your request is due less than 7 business days from today.

textTemplates.description: Rich Text for Contract Wizard Explaining Record Types
textTemplates.name: ContractRecordTypeExplanation
textTemplates.text:
CONTRACT RECORD TYPE DESCRIPTION CONSIDERATIONS
Procurement Choose this option when New Leaders is paying for materials or a service (Cash Out). Sub-types include:
  • Purchase Orders
  • Materials
  • Consulting Contracts
 A Salesforce procurement must be submitted and approved before signing any contracts with outside parties
Other Choose this option for any contracts not associated with Procurements or Opportunities. For example, use this option for NDAs.

textTemplates.description: Provides Help for Contract Type and New or Amend Screen
textTemplates.name: ContractTypeHelp
textTemplates.text: General Info Identifies whether a header or footer for a screen is available to the flow user. Help text is available from the header, and navigation buttons appear in the footer. User Input Screen Fields Lets users manually enter information. A flow user input field is a text box, long text area, number field, currency field, date field, date/time field, password field, or checkbox in a Screen element. Choice Screen Fields Lets users select from a set of choices. A flow choice field is a radio button, drop-down list, multi-select checkbox, or multi-select picklist in a Screen element. Display Text Screen Fields Displays information to users while they’re running the flow. Lightning Component Screen Fields Displays a Lightning component, such as to let the user upload a file. If your flow screen needs more than a simple input field or display text, build a custom Lightning component to fill the gap.

textTemplates.name: HowtoOppContract
textTemplates.text: Opportunity Contracts are created from an existing opportunity record. Please navigate to the related tab of your account and open an opportunity to create an Opportunity Contract - A Button is available on the opportunity page

textTemplates.description: comines first procurement screen fields for reference
